## Configuration.getRequired() method

Get required configuration option value. Throws an error if option is not available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRequired(option: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  option | <code>string</code> | Configuration option name. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

Configuration option value.
